name: Hardwood sword
description: It's said that the hero also began his
journey from the starting village with a wooden sword
This has become a goal for many adventurers to emulate
ability: Deals extra damage when the weapon nears breaking

name: Hardwood stick
description: A great shape sturdy wooden stick
perfect for kids,It’s also decent as a weapon
ability: Deals extra damage when the weapon nears breaking

name: Lumber Axe
description: A reliable companion for adventurers or pioneers exploring
forests. However, as it’s not designed for combat,
don’t rely on it too much in battle
ability: Deals increased damage to trees

name: Clenched Fist
description: No weapon equipped? Then just unleash a flurry of punches!
It may be a quick fix, but a fist full of spirit packs a serious punch
Why use a weapon when your fists can do the job?
ability: Punch damage scales with max HP!

name: Knight's sword
description: A weapon used by father in his youth,
well-maintained and seemingly issued to court knights
ability: When HP<\c[10]30%\c[0], this weapon's attack doubles

name: Lava Staff
description: A wand made from volcanic minerals,easily
concentrates fire elements However, a slight mistake
can cause it to explode, engulfing the user
ability: Hold right mouse button to cast \c[27]Crimson Lotus Meteor\c[0]

name: Ice Staff
description: A wand made from magic crystals, unleashes wide-range
frost. Very hard to control.Feels like it’s freezing my hand
ability: Hold right mouse button to cast \c[27]Frozen Spell\c[0]

name: Weird Feather
description: A feather from a weird bird. Extremely light and can
easily generate enough force to blow someone away
ability: Movement speed increases when using Whirlwind Slash
Enters a float state immune to falling after spin speed increases

name: Knight's sword
description: Weapons assigned to the palace knights
They symbolize the path of protection for the knights
ability: When HP<\c[10]30%\c[0], this weapon's attack doubles

name: Silver Greatsword
description: A greatsword, seemingly forged from silver,
radiating a dazzling glow. Its surface shines cold and hard,
though its true material remains unknown
ability: When HP falls below \c[29]400\c[0], the weapon’s full potential is limited!

name: Heavy Mallet
description: A bulky wooden hammer
Getting hit on the head is sure to leave you dizzy!
ability: 33% chance to inflict Stun state on attack
When HP falls below \c[29]400\c[0], the weapon’s full potential is limited!

name: Baseball Bat
description: A metal club. It’s said to be used for sports,
but it’s also great for whacking people.
ability: Durability Boost!
Reflected projectiles move faster and deal more damage

name: Rotten Fishbone
subtitle: "It's too smelly, throw it away!"
description: Leftover bones from a large fish, with rotting meat
still clinging to them, emitting an unbearable stench
ability: 66% chance to inflict Poison state on attack
Gives off a stench so foul, even monsters flee!

name: Giant Crab Claw
description: A massive crab claw that clamps on tight and won’t let go
Once it latches onto something, good luck getting it off
ability: When thrown, it clamps to the target, dealing constant damage
Cannot be retrieved unless the target dies

name: Frostmoon
subtitle: "Licked the blade and got my tongue stuck… So cold, so painful!"
"\str[121], don't lick random stuff!"
description: A magic sword made of ice, just near it sends a chilling cold
ability: 50% chance to inflict Freeze state on attack

name: Leaky Electric Sword
subtitle: "Zap... zap...!"
description: A cursed sword filled with wild energy, but it's still faulty
Be careful—it might shock the user as well
ability: 50% chance to inflict Lightning state on attack

name: Sunflare
subtitle: "\str[121], it looks scary, please don't hold it."
description: A magic sword that has absorbed solar energy over time
It seems particularly effective against certain monsters
ability: 40% chance to inflict Burn state on attack

name: Orc Bone Axe
description: A large axe made from the bones of defeated foes. Not
very sharp, and orcs often prefer to throw it rather than
use it in close combat
ability: Deals extra damage when the weapon is thrown

name: Nichirin
description: A replica forged in imitation of the forbidden blazing demon
sword from myth. Naturally, it cannot summon the earth-scorching
hellfire like the true original.
ability: May summon a meteor to strike a random location when attacking

name: Rusty Iron Sword
description: An old iron sword covered in rust, long since lost its sharpness
From another perspective, the corrosion itself is dangerously lethal...
ability: 15% chance to inflict Poison state on attack
Always inflicts Poison on bleeding targets

name: From Hell
subtitle: "This thing thirsts for blood..."
description: One of the weapons used by a notorious serial killer,
it's covered in blood
ability: 45% chance to inflict Bleeding state on attack

name: Forging Hammer
description: A heavy hammer once used by blacksmiths to forge metal
Now held in someone’s hand and used for all sorts of odd purposes
ability: Striking a weapon placed on the anvil repairs it
Unequipping this hammer also dispels the summoned anvil

name: Tidewyrm’s Song
description: A staff crafted from damp magic crystals, always dripping wet
It only reveals its true power when using water as a medium
quite inconvenient!
ability: Casting near water enhances magic
Hold right mouse button to cast Ripple Thrust

name: Storm Orc Axe
description: A greataxe wielded by an orc attuned to nature’s power.
Each swing tears the earth and sends gales howling with the blade
ability: Has a chance to unleash a burst of wind when attacking
When HP falls below \c[29]400\c[0], the weapon’s full potential is limited!

name: Starlit Night
description: A staff adorned with gemstones that sparkle like the Milky
Way. It has the power to create a strong gravitational field,
pulling intruders into the depths of darkness
ability: Hold right mouse button to cast Black Hole

name: Toxic Spore Blade
description: A slim sword dropped by Walking Mushrooms. Its dull blade
is coated with toxic spores, guaranteeing poison on every strike
Though low in durability, its toxins make it highly effective
ability: Attacks have a 50% chance to inflict Poison status

name: Pest Bane Staff
description: A special staff modified by an alchemist long tormented
by pests. It can instantly generate a toxic gas to kill
small creatures, and is said to also deodorize and disinfect
ability: Hold left mouse button to cast Extermination Magic

name: Kanesada
description: A beloved Katana that accompanied a girl striving for
swordsmanship's peak—never leaving her grasp, even in sleep
Whether sharp or not, it remains a witness to her journey
ability: Greatly enhances the effects of all learned skills

name: Claíomh Solais
subtitle: "Huh? I can't see anything! This isn't a sword hilt!?"
description: Blessed by light, the blade bends light, becoming an invisible sword
This makes it razor-sharp, and when needed, its radiance unleashes
ability: Attacks completely ignore the target's defense

name: Tyrfing
description: A man-made magic sword with a blade forged from mana crystals
Each slash unleashes a tangible sword wave. For skilled swordsmen,
it’s a weapon that greatly enhances their power
ability: Attacks generate sword waves that deal damage

name: Anti-Bullying Hammer
subtitle: "NO BULLYING!!"
description: A weapon born to punish evil adventurers.
Though just a toy hammer, getting bonked still hurts.
ability: Deals recoil damage when used for evil deeds
The lower your Sin value, the higher its damage

name: Den’s Hand Scythe
subtitle: "Remember this, Whirlwind Slash is used like this! "
description: A short-handled scythe carried by an outsider with a fearsome
design and a will dwelling within. Wielding it too long
may cause strange voices to echo in your mind
ability: Automatically returns to hand after being thrown and hitting
When catching the returning weapon, can throw it again

name: Mixed Flavor Popsicle
description: A edible weapon crafted with care by Kanban Musume of the NLCH
A tri-flavored popsicle combining chocolate, cream, and strawberry
Refreshing and delicious! But be sure to finish it before it melts...
ability: Might get eaten when attacking...
Melts and disappears over time when equipped...

name: Unit 2
description: A communication device bought from a suspicious shop
Just shout 'Fire!' and you'll receive sniper support from
somewhere. But, you have to pay phone bill yourself
ability: Left-click to call support fire, 1000 yen per use
Right-click to call a long-range snipe, 500 yen per use

name: Cone Greatsword
description: A edible weapon crafted with care by Kanban Musume of the NLCH
While keeping its weapon performance, it's also delicious!
ability: Might get eaten when attacking...
Melts and disappears over time when equipped...

name: Carrot Greatsword
description: A top-grade carrot secretly cultivated by the Maid Bunny
Infused with the power of stone, it overgrew into a delicacy
so tempting it could make a Maid Bunny cry with desire
ability: Might get eaten when attacking...
When thrown, it pierces and hits all units in its path

name: Frozen Carrot Greatsword
description: A top-grade carrot secretly cultivated by the Maid Bunny
After being frozen, it’s rock-hard and impossible to bite into
Rumor has it this was the maid bunny’s winter stash
ability: 40% chance to inflict Freeze state on attack
When thrown, it pierces and hits all units in its path

name: Moldy Carrot Greatsword
description: A top-grade carrot secretly cultivated by the Maid Bunny
Stored for too long, it’s now moldy and rotten...
no longer edible—the maid bunny keeps it to drive away enemies
ability: 40% chance to inflict Poison state on attack
When thrown, it pierces and hits all units in its path

name: Carrot?
description: A top-grade carr...
Huh? Is this really… a carrot!?
ability: When thrown, it pierces and hits all units in its path

name: Banana?
subtitle: "Is this really a banana...?"
description: A peeled banana that must be held carefully
ability: At high speeds, it’s easy to fling the banana away... Eek!?

name: Giant Snail Vacuum
description: A vacuum made from a giant snail's shell
Modified airflow for powerful suction
ability: Hold mouse to pull objects closer

name: Ancient Tree Remnant
description: A bizarre branch weapon, obtained from an ancient tree trunk,
hard yet brimming with vitality and still growing
ability: Defeating enemies auto-repairs weapon durability
Excess durability grants +1 ATK per 1% above max

name: Parasitic Blade
description: A sword consumed by a tree over centuries, where metal and
life fused into mysterious harmony. Its blade pulses like
it’s breathing, radiating a strange warmth to the wielder
ability: Restores \c[29]${Math.floor(1.2*$gameParty.leader().paramPlus(2))}\c[0] HP to the wielder upon defeating an enemy

name: Ancient Glory
subtitle: "Unleash the Golden Power ⬆⬆⬇⬇⬅⮕⬅⮕"
description: A dazzling golden demon sword, one of the treasures of
the World Administrator. That man once wielded it,
battling in the Abyss for three days and nights without rest
ability: Unleashes its power when a secret command is entered

name: Willow Leaf Greatsword
description: "Pluck leaves, scatter flowers, wound your foes"
A very sharp greatsword shaped like willow leaves
ability: Has a chance to fire willow leaf shurikens when attacking

name: Infested Blade
subtitle: "Ugh, the slime is still wriggling... So gross!!"
description: A greatsword infested with resilient, life-hungry slime
Its craving for vitality makes the slime fiercely aggressive
ability: Deals extra damage to Bleeding enemies
Drains blood if the target dies while Bleeding

name: Hercules's Broken Horn
description: A sword forged from the sturdy horn of a rhinoceros beetle
Though once broken in fierce battle, its hardness remains genuine
Because of that, it became extremely durable when reforged
ability: The lower the damage, the less durability is consumed
No durability is consumed if damage is ${QJ.MPMZ.tl.herculesBrokenHornEffectProcess()} or below

name: Hardwood Bow
description: A longbow made of Hardwood
It can shoot arrows, but its performance is very average
ability: Hold right-click to charge and release a \c[27]Piercing Arrow\c[0]
Piercing Arrow lose damage per target pierced

name: Hunter's Bow
description: A composite longbow that reduces draw strength
Less damage, but easier rapid fire
ability: +Attack Speed, -20% Damage, -20% Durability Loss
Hold right-click to charge and release a \c[27]Piercing Arrow\c[0]

name: Sunset Cloud
description: A magical bow filled with fire energy
Not only burns enemies, but also fires explosive arrows
ability: Hold right-click to charge and release a \c[27]Explosive Arrow\c[0]
Explosive Arrow explode on hit

name: Snow Watch
description: A magical bow covered in ice. Shoots ice arrows
and can freeze a wide area with a charged shot
ability: Hold right-click to charge and release a \c[27]Icebound Arrow\c[0]
Icebound Arrow freeze targets on hit

name: Chidori
description: A golden bow capable of summoning thunder,
named for its buzzing sound reminiscent of lightning
However, be careful—it’s highly conductive
ability: Hold right-click to charge and release a \c[27]Thunder Arrow\c[0]

name: Hellhound Cursed Bow
description: A product of the Abyss, this oddly shaped bow can
fire multiple arrows simultaneously. However,
this eerie magic bow remains sealed, with its true power unreleased
ability: Hold right-click to charge and release a \c[27]Piercing Arrow\c[0]

name: Blood Hunt
description: A blood-stained longbow.
Each draw leaves the string wet with its wielder’s own blood,
until the arrow returns with a sweeter offering
ability: Hold right-click to charge and release a \c[27]Blood Piercing Arrow\c[0]
Consumes HP to empower shots. Killing arrows drain blood
